Request.FormattedCode:
<cuicOperationRequest> <payload> <![CDATA[ <NetAppCreateLUNConfig> <HANDLER_NAME>Create NetApp LUN</HANDLER_NAME>
<DISPLAY_LABEL>Create LUN</DISPLAY_LABEL>
<dcName>{0}</dcName>
<accountName>{1}</accountName>
<filerName>{2}</filerName>
<aggregate>{3}</aggregate>
<!-- Accepts value from the list: volumeIdentity--> <volume>{4}@{5};{6}@{7}</volume>
<!-- Accepts value from the list: lunName--> <lunName>{8}</lunName>
<!-- Accepts value from the list: ostype--> <osType>vmware</osType>
<!-- Accepts value from the list: netAppLunSize--> <lunSize>{9}</lunSize>
<!-- Accepts value from the list: sizeUnit--> <sizeUnit>GB</sizeUnit>
<spaceReserve>true</spaceReserve>
</NetAppCreateLUNConfig>
]]> </payload> </cuicOperationRequest>

ActivityNode.Notes: If this execution fails, execute the contained workflow nodes.

VariableReference.DisplayPath: Workflow.Convert JSON to XML - Reports.XML Output

Request.FormattedCode:
<cuicOperationRequest> <operationType>MAP_LUN_IGROUP_FILER</operationType> <payload> <![CDATA[ <NetAppMapLUNToIGroupConfig> <HANDLER_NAME>Map NetApp LUN</HANDLER_NAME>
<DISPLAY_LABEL>Map LUN to Initiator Group</DISPLAY_LABEL>
<autoHide>true</autoHide>
<dcName>{0}</dcName>
<accountName>{1}</accountName>
<!-- Accepts value from the list: filerIdentity--> <filerName>{2}@{3};{4}</filerName>
<!-- Accepts value from the list: NetAppMapLUNToIGroupList--> <initiatorGroup>{5}</initiatorGroup>
<idOption>false</idOption>
<!-- Set this value only when autoHide not equals to true -->
<!-- Accepts value from the list: lunId--> <lunID>null</lunID>
<!-- Accepts value from the list: NetAppMapLUNToIGroupLunPathList--> <lunPath>{6}</lunPath>
</NetAppMapLUNToIGroupConfig>
]]> </payload> </cuicOperationRequest>
